trans-unit.source: Generates proxy class code for Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) services
trans-unit.target: 生成 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服务的代理类代码

trans-unit.source: The WCFBuildProvider uses mapping files (.svcmap) at the root level of the Web application that contains WCF service references.
trans-unit.target: WCFBuildProvider 使用的 Web 应用程序包含 WCF 服务引用的根级别的映射文件 (.svcmap)。

trans-unit.source: The mapping files specify the services for which proxy class source code must be generated.
trans-unit.target: 映射文件指定必须为其生成代理类源代码的服务。

trans-unit.source: The generated proxy class is then compiled with the other resources during the Web application compilation phase.
trans-unit.target: 然后，在 Web 应用程序编译阶段期间用其他资源对生成的代理类进行编译。

trans-unit.source: The inherited <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider.VirtualPath%2A> property is internally defined and points to the Web application root directory where the .svcmap files reside.
trans-unit.target: 继承<xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider.VirtualPath%2A>属性内部定义和点到.svcmap 文件所驻留的 Web 应用程序根目录。</xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider.VirtualPath%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.WCFBuildProvider"></xref> class.
Generates the service proxy class source code and adds it to the specified assembly builder.
trans-unit.target: 生成服务代理类源代码，并将其添加到指定程序集生成器。

trans-unit.source: This method searches for .svcmap files in the Web application root directory.
trans-unit.target: 此方法搜索.svcmap 在 Web 应用程序根目录的文件。

trans-unit.source: If files are found, the method generates the source code of a proxy class for the related services into the specified `assemblyBuilder`.
trans-unit.target: 如果未找到文件，该方法都会相关服务的代理类的源代码生成到指定`assemblyBuilder`。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder> object that the generated proxy code must be added to.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder>必须将生成的代理代码添加到的对象。</xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This instance is provided by ASP.NET at run time.
trans-unit.target: 此实例在运行时由 ASP.NET 提供。
